response.overview: For nearly 50 years, the World’s Largest Raccoon Hunt has been a cherished annual tradition in Decatur County, bringing together the community for a cause that matters. This documentary short, The World’s Largest Raccoon Hunt, captures the heart of this unique event, which has raised millions of dollars in charity for St. Jude’s Children’s Hospital. This film dives into the history, culture, and impact of the hunt, showcasing the dedication and passion of those who participate year after year. It’s more than just a hunt; it’s a tradition that has become an essential part of the community, uniting people for a greater good.
response.title: The World’s Largest Raccoon Hunt
